General.Name: Afyren SAS
General.Description: AFYREN SAS, provides petroleum based molecules primarily used in feed, food, flavors and fragrances, life sciences, materials sciences, lubricants and technical fluids, and technology sectors. It offers bio sourced organic acids, such as acetic acid, propionic acid, butyric acid, isobutyric acid, valeric acid, isovaleric acid, and caproic acid. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Clermont-Ferrand, France.

1.Name: Mr. Jeremy  Pessiot
1.Title: Chief Technology Officer, Founder, Chief Innovation Officer, MD & Board Observer

4.Name: Ms. Caroline  Petigny
4.Title: Chief Sustainability Officer and Director of CSR, Communication & Public Affairs
